custom-sql.sql: SELECT Limsmuc_Participant.pid pid, Limsmuc_Participant.cid cid, Limsmuc_Participant.participantId participantId, Limsmuc_Participant.unreadMessagesCount unreadMessagesCount, Limsmuc_Participant.isOpened isOpened, Limsmuc_Participant.openedAt openedAt FROM Limsmuc_Participant INNER JOIN Limsmuc_Conversation ON (Limsmuc_Conversation.cid = Limsmuc_Participant.cid) WHERE Limsmuc_Participant.participantId = ? AND Limsmuc_Participant.hasLeft = [$FALSE$] AND (Limsmuc_Conversation.cid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT Limsmuc_Message.cid FROM Limsmuc_Participant INNER JOIN Limsmuc_Message ON (Limsmuc_Message.cid = Limsmuc_Participant.cid) WHERE Limsmuc_Participant.participantId = ? AND Limsmuc_Participant.hasLeft = [$FALSE$] ) ) ORDER BY Limsmuc_conversation.updatedAt DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Limsmuc_Message.cid) as participatedCount FROM Limsmuc_Participant INNER JOIN Limsmuc_Message ON (Limsmuc_Message.cid = Limsmuc_Participant.cid) WHERE Limsmuc_Participant.participantId = ? AND Limsmuc_Participant.hasLeft = [$FALSE$]
